teaser: Now that President Obama has suggested publicly that Ben Bernanke might not stay on at the Federal Reserve past January, the quest is on for replacements.

description: Now that President Obama has suggested publicly that Ben Bernanke might not stay on at the Federal Reserve past January, the quest is on for replacements.
contentencoded: Now that President Obama has suggested publicly that Ben Bernanke might not stay on at the Federal Reserve past January, the quest is on for names. Christopher Low, chief economist at FTN Financial, joins Marketplace Morning Report host David Brancaccio to discuss.
title: Interested in running the Fed? Any one?
itags: Marketplace Morning Report for Friday, June 28, 2013
